title: Last Seen Wearing...
description: One Friday afternoon pretty Lowell Mitchell disappears from the campus of Parker College. She is never seen alive again. Detective Chief Frank Ford and his assistant Cameron patiently begin to track down clues: Lowell's diary lists a number of men -- any one of whom could be suspected of foul play; a man had been seen lurking around the dormitory at night; and Lowell's hair clip had been found near a bridge over the campus lake. With this start, and a few other intangible clues, Ford finally discovers why some girls leave school suddenly ... and forever.(from the back cover)
author: Hillary Waugh
